Package it.polimi.softeng.network.server

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.softeng.network.server.Lobby
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class Lobby extends Object implements Runnable
This is the Lobby class. It manages the lobby from its creation to the game setup, when the maximum number of player is reached.

  • Constructor Details

    • Lobby

      public Lobby(String lobbyName, String username, LobbyClient lobbyMaster)
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - String which identifies the lobby
      username - String name of the first player who creates this lobby
      lobbyMaster - the first player, who created the lobby

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      Run method of the Lobby. Once created, the lobby waits for other players. When the number of players is reached, it invokes the setupGame() method, then manages the message queue.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable

    • getClients

      public HashMap<String,LobbyClient> getClients()
      Returns:
      HashMap of LobbyClient, representing the clients of the lobby

    • getMaxPlayers

      public int getMaxPlayers()
      Returns:
      int number of players that can connect to this lobby

    • getWhiteList

      public ArrayList<String> getWhiteList()
      Returns:
      ArrayList of usernames in lobby whitelist (usernames that are allowed to connect to this lobby)

    • getLobbyStats

      public String getLobbyStats()
      Returns:
      String explaining the status of the lobby

    • processMessageQueue

      public void processMessageQueue() throws LobbyClientDisconnectedException, GameIsOverException
      Method that processes and manages the messages present in the queue
      Throws:
      LobbyClientDisconnectedException - when a client disconnects from the lobby
      GameIsOverException - when the game ends
      LobbyEmptyException - when the lobby remains empty

    • connectClient

      public void connectClient(LobbyClient client)
      This method adds a client to the lobby and loads the game if it has already started (in case of reconnect)
      Parameters:
      client - the client to add to the lobby
